actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to the closing of recreation facilities at Corps of Engineers civil works projects.

summary.text: Urges the Assistant Secretary of the Army for Civil Works to refrain from closing Corps of Engineers recreation areas or taking any other action resulting in a decline in the availability of such areas.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to the closing of recreation facilities at Corps of Engineers civil works projects.
